en: Woe to her that is rebellious and polluted! to the oppressing city!
hmr: Khawpui nêksâwra um, sukpawr- chea um le hela um chu a chung a va rik de!

en: She obeyed not the voice; she received not correction; she trusted not in Jehovah; she drew not near to her God.
hmr: Ama chun râwl chu a pawisa nawh a, sukdikna chu a pawm nawh a, LALPA khawm chu a ring nawh a; a Pathien khawm chu a hung hnai bawk nawh a.

en: Her princes in the midst of her are roaring lions; her judges are evening wolves; they leave nothing till the morrow.
hmr: A sûnga chun a mi ṭhahai chu sakeibaknei inrûm lai ang an na; a rorêltuhai chu zâna sihalhai ang an nih; a zînga chen dingin iengkhawm an hla naw a nih.

en: Her prophets are light and treacherous persons; her priests have profaned the sanctuary, they have done violence to the law.
hmr: A zâwlneihai khawm chu mi ngaisam le mi khawhlo an na, a thiempuhai hlak chun hmun inthieng chu an sukpawrche tah a, dâna chun inpâwngnêkna chu an hmang ta a nih.

en: Jehovah in the midst of her is righteous; he will not do iniquity; every morning doth he bring his justice to light, he faileth not; but the unjust knoweth no shame.
hmr: Ama sûnga chun LALPA chu mi indik a na; rîtlona chu thaw naw ni; zîng tinin a rorêlna chu varah a hung lâk suok a, a thlâwn ngai hrim hrim nawh a; amiruokchu, mi fel naw chun inzakna a hriet naw a nih.

en: I have cut off nations; their battlements are desolate; I have made their streets waste, so that none passeth by; their cities are destroyed, so that there is no man, so that there is no inhabitant.
hmr: Hnamhai chu ka sât thlâk a, an in insânghai chen khawm chu râu- sanin a um tah a; an kawtthlêrhai chu ka suksiet vawng a, tukhawma an hraw ta nawh a; an khawpuihai chu suksietin a um a, chuongchun, mi an um ta nawh a, a hluotu khawm an um ta nawh.

en: I said, Only fear thou me; receive correction; so her dwelling shall not be cut off, according to all that I have appointed concerning her: but they rose early and corrupted all their doings.
hmr: Ama chungthua ka lo ruot ta ang po poin, a chêngna chu sât thlâk a ni nawna dingin. “Matheiloin kei mi ṭîng i ta, sukdikna chu hmu bawk i tih,” ka ta; nisienlakhawm, zîngkâr an tho a, an thilthawhai po poa chun an sukdik nawh a.

en: Therefore wait ye for me, saith Jehovah, until the day that I rise up to the prey; for my determination is to gather the nations, that I may assemble the kingdoms, to pour upon them mine indignation, even all my fierce anger; for all the earth shall be devoured with the fire of my jealousy.
hmr: LALPA chun, “Chuleichun, kei mi nghâk unla, sase se dinga ka tho ni hmakhat chun, ka thiltum chu, ka lunginsenna ṭium tak le ka lungin- thak nasatak chu bun khum dinga ramhai ka kei khâwm theina dingin hnamhai kei khâwm chu a ni sih a; leihnuoi hluo po po chu ka îtthîkna mei chun a kâng hmang ding a ni sih a.

en: For then will I turn to the peoples of a pure language, that they may all call upon the name of Jehovah, to serve him with one consent.
hmr: Chun, chutaka inthawk chun hmûr inthieng put chihai kuoma chun kîr nâwk ka ta, lungril hmun- khata a rawng bâwl dinga LALPA hming chu an rênga an lam theina dingin.

en: From beyond the rivers of Ethiopia my suppliants, even the daughter of my dispersed, shall bring mine offering.
hmr: Ethiopia vadunghai khêla in- thawk chun ka riminhnik rawtuhai, ka hnawtdarhai naunuhmeihai ngei chun, ka thil inhlânhai chu hung chawi an ta.

en: In that day shalt thou not be put to shame for all thy doings, wherein thou hast transgressed against me; for then I will take away out of the midst of thee thy proudly exulting ones, and thou shalt no more be haughty in my holy mountain.
hmr: Chu nia chun i thil thawhai po po, ka chunga i bawsietnahai lei chun inzak ta naw ti nih a; nanga sûnga inthawkin nasataka nang chapopui- tuhai che chu ka lâk suok ding a ni ta sih a; chuongchun, ka tlâng inthienga chun chapo ta ngai hrim hrim naw ti nih.

en: But I will leave in the midst of thee an afflicted and poor people, and they shall take refuge in the name of Jehovah.
hmr: Amiruokchu, i sûnga chun mi pasiehai le mî sukrimsika umhai chu mâksan ka ta, LALPA hming chu ring tâng an tih.

en: The remnant of Israel shall not do iniquity, nor speak lies; neither shall a deceitful tongue be found in their mouth; for they shall feed and lie down, and none shall make them afraid.
hmr: Israel mi hlabîkhai chun rîtlona thaw ta naw ni hai a, khêl khawm hril ta ngai naw nihai; an bauhaia chun lei mi hlêm hmangna hrim hrim khawm hmu ni ngai ta naw nih; khawp dingin fâng an ta, zâl an tih, tukhawma an sukṭi ta naw ding a ni sih a,” a ta.

en: Sing, O daughter of Zion; shout, O Israel; be glad and rejoice with all the heart, O daughter of Jerusalem.
hmr: Aw Zion naunuhai, hla sak ro; aw Israel, khêk suok rawh; Aw Jerusalem naunu, lungril po poin hlimin lâwm rawh.

en: Jehovah hath taken away thy judgments, he hath cast out thine enemy: the King of Israel, even Jehovah, is in the midst of thee; thou shalt not fear evil any more.
hmr: LALPA chun i chungthu rêlna chu a lâk hmang tah a, I hmêlma khawm chu a hnawt dawk tah a nih; Israel Lal, Lalpa ngei chu nangmaa chun a um a, Thil ṭha naw hril ṭi ta dêr naw ti nih.

en: In that day it shall be said to Jerusalem, Fear thou not; O Zion, let not thy hands be slack.
hmr: Chu ni chun Jerusalem kuoma chun, “Ṭi ta naw rawh: Aw Zion, i kut chu inzawitir naw rawh.

en: Jehovah thy God is in the midst of thee, a mighty one who will save; he will rejoice over thee with joy; he will rest in his love; he will joy over thee with singing.
hmr: LALPA i Pathien thilthawthei- tak, sandamtu ding chu i sûnga chun a um a; Nang chu hlimnain lâwm a ti che a, a hmangainaa chun châwl a ta, Hla sakin nangmaa chun hlim a tih.

en: I will gather them that sorrow for the solemn assembly, who were of thee; to whom the burden upon her was a reproach.
hmr: Nangma ta, sie hmanga um tahai, hrilsietna riktaka phurtuhai chu inkhâwmna ursûntaka dingin kei khâwm ka tih.

en: Behold, at that time I will deal with all them that afflict thee; and I will save that which is lame, and gather that which was driven away; and I will make them a praise and a name, whose shame hath been in all the earth.
hmr: Ngai ta, chu pha chun nangma sukrimsituhai che chu keiin sawisâng ka ta: A ngîr chu sandam ka ta, hnawt hmanga um chu kei khâwm ka tih; Hnuoi chung po poa an hmaimâwkna lo um ta chu, Hming le inpâkna siempêk ka tih.

en: At that time will I bring you in, and at that time will I gather you; for I will make you a name and a praise among all the peoples of the earth, when I bring back your captivity before your eyes, saith Jehovah.
hmr: Chu pha chun hung la lût kati cheh a, chu pha chun la khâwm ka ti cheu; In mithmu ngeia in sal intângna ka hung lâk kîr pha chun, Leihnuoia hnam po polaia chun, inpâkna le hming ka siempêk ding cheu a ni sih a,” LALPA chun a tih.
